channel.title: NPC Talking Bug
channel.description: I can't get NPC's to talk, not like the yellow chat talk, the menu talk, I set it all up like the TUT, no Errors, and I am using QuestScape and I heard people are having troble with it..

item.title: NPC Talking Bug

item.description:
@andymarrs wrote:

I can’t get NPC’s to talk, not like the yellow chat talk, the menu talk, I set it all up like the TUT, no Errors, and I am using QuestScape and I heard people are having troble with it…
